note.p: Physician and psychiatrist. MD, University of Aberdeen, 1876. Clinical assistant and senior assistant medical officer, West Riding Asylum, Yorkshire, 1869–72. Medical superintendent and proprietor, Plympton House Asylum, Plympton, Devon, from 1873 until his retirement. Member of the Medico-Psychological Association. Author of papers in the West Riding Lunatic Asylum Medical Reports.
Roll of graduates of the University of Aberdeen.
